page.title: 15Youth clubs in Upton
page.content: We asked the public of Lychett Minster for their views on the area and spacifically entertainment facilities. Upton has a growing residential area and a small industrial estate. All the people we asked said how pleasant the area was. There is a growing number of young married people with babies and there are several groups to help them. There is a Mothers and Toddlers group, Play hour which is run by Edaine White, as well as Sunday School and coffee mornings. There are youth clubs for children 9 to 13 years run by Mrs. C. Seed. There are Scouts and Venture Scouts for the older children run by Mrs. Young. There is also a cricket club for the boys in summer. For the girls there are Brownies, Guides and the Tennis Club organised by Mrs. Singleton.
